com.cyc.query

Interface QueryAnswer

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ParaphrasedQueryAnswer

    public interface QueryAnswer
    Encodes one answer to a Query.

    Unlike InferenceAnswer, this class is designed to use KB API classes, so variables are Variables, and bindings are returned as KbObjects where possible.

    • Method Summary

        <O> O getBinding(Variable var)
        Get the value to which the specified variable is bound.
        Type Parameters:
        O - The expected class of the value.
        Parameters:
        var - The variable for which the binding is sought.
        Returns:
        The value to which var is bound in this answer.

      • hasBinding

        Does the specified variable have a value in this query answer?

        var - The variable for which the binding is sought.
        Returns:

      • getOnlyBinding

        <O> O getOnlyBinding()
              throws QueryRuntimeException
        Returns the value for a single-variable query.

        This method specifically expects the query to return bindings for exactly one variable; the existence of more than variable will be interpreted as an error which will result in a QueryRuntimeException. If the query has more than one variable, use getBinding(com.cyc.kb.Variable) instead.

        Type Parameters:
        O - The expected class of the value
        Returns:
        The value which is bound to the only variable for this answer
        Throws:
        QueryRuntimeException
        See Also:
        getBinding(com.cyc.kb.Variable)

      • getBindings

        Map<Variable,Object> getBindings()
        Get the values to which the all variables are bound.
        Returns:
        A mapping from variables to the values to which they are bound in this answer.

      • getId

        InferenceAnswerIdentifier getId()
        Get the identifier for this answer. This can be used to unambiguously identify this answer to the Cyc that produced it, so long as the inference has not been destroyed.
        Returns:
        the identifier.

      • getSources

        Set<KbTerm> getSources()
        Get the attributed sources used in inferring this answer. Generally, results will include SKSI sources, or terms used in meta-assertions using sourceOfTerm-NonTrivial or its specializations. Note that this method works by introspecting on the inference object, and will not work if the inference has already been destroyed when this is called. The canonical way of ensuring that the inference is not destroyed immediately is to call Query.retainInference(), though there are other ways of ensuring the inference is not immediately destroyed, such as com.cyc.query.Query#setBrowsable(boolean) and com.cyc.query.Query#setContinuable(boolean).
        Returns:
        A set of KbTerms that are the attributed sources for this answer.

      • toPrettyBindingsStrings

        List<String> toPrettyBindingsStrings()
